items.name: System Probe
items.description: An autonomous probe which scans for anomalies throughout a star system.

items.name: Metal Scraps
items.description: Metal scraps from the wreck of a spaceship or structure.

items.name: Power Cell
items.description: Intact power cell used to provide energy to a spaceship.

items.name: Drone Core
items.description: The core from the wreck of a drone.

items.name: Ancient Artifact
items.description: A mysterious artifact from an ancient spacefaring civilization. Highly valuable to collectors.

items.name: Zenith
items.description: The Zenith is an agile starship developed to be able to hold its own in combat with normal fighters.

items.name: Falcon
items.description: The Falcon is a swift starship designed for overtaking other ships in warp and having unmatched speed on the battlefield.

items.name: Sabre
items.description: The Sabre is a powerful ship that makes up for its lack in speed with impressive firepower and tanking ability.

items.name: Aurora
items.description: The Aurora is a general-purpose fighter spacecraft that can perform well in a large array of situations.

items.name: Marlin
items.description: The Marlin is a nimble vessel that is designed to mine efficiently but be capable of making a quick escape when necessary.

items.name: Badger
items.description: The Badger is an entry-level miner-class ship best suited as a starter mining ship. While it mines very efficiently, it's less capable of making a quick escape.

items.name: Spectator
items.description: Admin spectating ship with extreme stats — not normally usable in play.

items.name: Spectator-X
items.description: Enhanced version of the Spectator ship for advanced testing.

items.name: Luminar
items.description: Based on the Aurora chassis, the Luminar is an advanced fighter whose heavy shields give it a distinct advantage in combat situations.

items.name: Paragon
items.description: An advanced upgraded variant of the Falcon, the Paragon is one of the fastest and most agile ships in the galaxy.

items.name: Claymore
items.description: The Claymore, an advanced upgrade of the successful Sabre chassis, is a hull tanking machine with remarkably strong damage output.

items.name: Polaris
items.description: The Polaris is an advanced upgrade of the Zenith design that generally improves upon its speed, offense, and defense.

items.name: Mako
items.description: An advanced upgrade of the Marlin, the Mako has an improved speed and mining rate over its predecessor.

items.name: Honey Badger
items.description: The Honey Badger takes the ore extraction rate of the Badger and dials it up even further, creating a sturdy and extremely efficient mining ship.

items.name: Infinity
items.description: The Infinity is a corvette designed with a focus around rapid response, having a comparatively flat warp speed and charge time, as well as substantial damage and shield regen. However, its lack of overall hull and shield durability make it susceptible to melting under pressure.

items.name: Radix
items.description: The Radix corvette has a radical design, giving it a significant speed advantage over ships of a comparable size. It is significantly less armored, in the hopes that its speed and maneuverability allow it to avoid damage altogether.

items.name: Chevron
items.description: The Chevron is a workhorse warship that makes up for its lack in agility with strength and stubbornness.
